About
=====

My name is Paulo Ferreira Naibert, I have a Phd in Applied Economics from
[Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul](https://www.ufrgs.br/ppge/).

My research focused mainly in Stock and Bond Markets, and portfolio selection by quantitative methods.
I have experience in `R` software and $\LaTeX$.

My main interests are programming and Economics.
